meanings.definition: Relating to or resembling the onion or garlic plant.
meanings.sent1: The alliaceous aroma of the kitchen made my mouth water.
meanings.sent2: The alliaceous scent of the soup filled the room with a familiar smell.
meanings.sent3: I could smell the alliaceous onions from across the garden!
meanings.sent4: The alliaceous essence of the dish added a flavorful kick to the meal.
meanings.sent5: The alliaceous nature of the garlic was unmistakable in the sauce.

meanings.definition: Having a pungent odor or taste characteristic of garlic or onions.
meanings.sent1: The alliaceous flavor of the dish lingered on my taste buds.
meanings.sent2: The alliaceous aroma of the stew made my eyes water.
meanings.sent3: The alliaceous onions were so strong they made me cry!
meanings.sent4: The alliaceous taste of the sauce was a bold addition to the meal.
meanings.sent5: The alliaceous scent of garlic filled the kitchen with its distinctive smell.
